author: Luc Olinga
title: Bitcoin Is Lost In Washington, and Nobody Is Looking for It
description: Congress just passed its biggest crypto law ever, and Bitcoin didn’t even get a mention. Once the face of financial rebellion, it’s now sidelined while stablecoins take the spotlight.
content:
Bitcoin may be the most famous cryptocurrency on the planet, but in Washington, its suddenly the ghost at the party.
This week, lawmakers passed the GENIUS Act, the first-ever U.S. law focused entir… [+2242 chars]
